document_data.name: ''Elfhost''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elfhost''''' was a [[sentient item|sentient]] [[longsword]] of the [[House Floshin]] [[Sun elf|sun elves]].{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep|4}}
document_data.Description: Forged especially to defeat [[elf|elves]]' foes, the sword's pommel featured a large [[ruby]] and its blade was [[mithral]].
document_data.Powers: A ''+5 longsword'', ''Elfhost''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s strikes were especially damaging to [[goblinoid]]s. The sword could ''[[teleport without error]]'', ''[[locate object]]s'', and ''[[heal]]'' those it touched in addition to magically ''[[defending]]'' its bearer. It also could ''[[detect secret doors|detect]]'' nearby secret doors and [[gem]]s.
document_data.Reputation: The sword was given its name by its orc and goblin foes.
document_data.Notable Owners: ''Elfhost'' belonged to [[Elorfindar Floshin]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and had been passed down in the family for generations.
